tagline: Policy control plane for autonomous agents
one_sentence_purpose: An open-source control plane that sits between AI agents (and robots) and execution systems, enforcing policy, approval workflows, and evidence-first governance.
target_users: Enterprise teams deploying autonomous AI agents or robots who need governance, approval gates, and audit trails
visual_metaphors: a gatehouse or checkpoint portal between agents and actions
a traffic control tower overseeing autonomous agent flight paths
